title: Piz Gren
text: Piz Gren () is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the Swiss <a href="Lepontine%20Alps">Lepontine Alps</a>, located between <a href="Tenigerbad">Tenigerbad</a> and <a href="Lumbrein">Lumbrein</a> in the canton of <a href="Graub%C3%BCnden">Graubünden</a>. Its summit () lies near the tripoint between <a href="Val%20Sumvitg">Val Sumvitg</a>, <a href="Val%20Gronda">Val Gronda</a>, and <a href="Val%20Miedra">Val Miedra</a>.
